View Javadoc

1   package org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.detector;
2   
3   import org.openimaj.image.FImage;
4   
5   /**
6    * The variance filter forms the first step of the {@link DetectorCascade#detect(FImage)}.
7    * For each window in the {@link DetectorCascade} a variance is calculated using {@link IntegralImage} 
8    * for speed.
9    * 
10   * Windows are filtered by whether they contain more variance than minVar which is the variance of 
11   * the original bounding box being tracked
12   * @author Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
13   *
14   */
15  public class VarianceFilter {
16  
17  	private IntegralImage integralImg;
18  	private IntegralImage integralImg_squared;
19  
20  	/**
21  	 * whether the variance filter is enabled
22  	 */
23  	public boolean enabled;
24  	int[][] windowOffsets;
25  
26  	/**
27  	 * the results of the variance check are saved to this results instance
28  	 */
29  	public DetectionResult detectionResult;
30  
31  	/**
32  	 * the minimum variance (variance of the original bounding box)
33  	 */
34  	public float minVar;
35  
36  	/**
37  	 * enabled with a 0 minvar (most permissive)
38  	 */
39  	public VarianceFilter() {
40  		enabled = true;
41  		minVar = 0;
42  		integralImg = null;
43  		integralImg_squared = null;
44  	}
45  
46  	private double calcVariance(int winIndex) {
47  		int offIndex = DetectorCascade.TLD_WINDOW_OFFSET_SIZE * winIndex;
48  		double[][] ii1 = integralImg.data;
49  		double[][] ii2 = integralImg_squared.data;
50  		int[][] off = this.windowOffsets;
51  		int[] tlXY = off[offIndex + 0];
52  		int[] blXY = off[offIndex + 1];
53  		int[] trXY = off[offIndex + 2];
54  		int[] brXY = off[offIndex + 3];
55  		int[] area = off[offIndex + 5];
56  		double mX  = (ii1[brXY[1]][brXY[0]] - ii1[trXY[1]][trXY[0]] - ii1[blXY[1]][blXY[0]] + ii1[tlXY[1]][tlXY[0]]) / (float) area[0]; //Sum of Area divided by area
57  		double mX2 = (
58  			ii2[brXY[1]][brXY[0]] - 
59  			ii2[trXY[1]][trXY[0]] - 
60  			ii2[blXY[1]][blXY[0]] + 
61  			ii2[tlXY[1]][tlXY[0]]
62  		) / (float) area[0];
63  		return mX2 - mX*mX;
64  	}
65  
66  	/**
67  	 * calculates the integralImage and the integral(image*image) (these are used to calculate variance)
68  	 * @param img
69  	 */
70  	public void nextIteration(FImage img) {
71  		if(!enabled) return;
72  		integralImg = new IntegralImage();
73  		integralImg.calcIntImg(img,false);
74  
75  		integralImg_squared = new IntegralImage();
76  		integralImg_squared.calcIntImg(img, true);
77  	}
78  
79  	
80  
81  	/**
82  	 * @param windowIndex
83  	 * @return whether the ith window has a variance higher than minvar 
84  	 */
85  	public boolean filter(int windowIndex) {
86  		if(!enabled) return true;
87  
88  		float bboxvar = (float) calcVariance(windowIndex);
89  
90  		detectionResult.variances[windowIndex] = bboxvar;
91  
92  		if(bboxvar < minVar) {
93  			return false;
94  		}
95  
96  		return true;
97  	}
98  }
